column2: # CREATININE,HEIGHT,BMI,MET and DHPMA don't show non-linearity characteristics.

lm(formula = dietaryMCPD ~ CREATININE + HEIGHT + BMI + bs(age) + 
    bs(BEANOILintake) + bs(PEANUTOIintake) + bs(LARDOILintake) + 
    MET + DHPMA_a + bs(totalenergy) + MARRIAGE + SEX + FAMINCOM5w + 
    CVD + SMOKE + HBP + alcohol + education, data = data_MCPD)
